GlycanBuilder

10 months ago

Summary

GlycanBuilder is a tool that allows you to draw Glycan structures in CFG or Oxford nomenclature. SATurn includes the GlycanBuilder tool which allows you to save Glycans into the SATurn database.

You can learn more about GlycanBuilder here

SATurn Integration
  • Import glycans using the built-in import menu within GlycanBuilder
  • Export glycans using the built-in export menu within GlycanBuilder
  • Export glycans as images
  • Display mass and m/z values (configurable)
  • Drag and drop files ending in glycoct_condensed onto the SATurn workspace panel to load
  • Note that GlycanBuilder allows multiple glycans to be drawn on a single canvas but SATurn can only save one of these to the database (to be addressed in GlycanBuilder)

If GlycanBuilder doesn't appear to be working please see these Instructions
